interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You Review Date: 2019/06/23 Store: Chamvict Product Description: ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: These headphones have really decent quality for some budget headphones. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don’t fit snug at all, it’s almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It’s definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you’re ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn’t have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. I’m too afraid to make sudden movements because they feel like they will slip off. Review Title: Comfortable, but loose fitting Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} These headphones have really decent quality for some budget headphones. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don’t fit snug at all, it’s almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It’s definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you’re ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn’t have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. I’m too afraid to make sudden movements because they feel like they will slip off. Comfortable, but loose fitting
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Gaming and technology, with a focus on audio quality and comfort during extended use.
- **Product Preferences:** Prefers budget-friendly options that provide decent sound quality and comfort; values features such as noise cancellation and microphone functionality.
- **Comfort Needs:** Highly prioritizes comfort with long-term use, indicates a preference for cushioned and breathable materials but is sensitive to fit, expressing dissatisfaction when headphones do not fit snugly.
- **Usage Context:** Engages in gaming across multiple platforms, indicating a need for versatility in product compatibility.
- **Feedback Trends:** Provides constructive criticism on product fit and performance, suggesting an analytical and thoughtful approach to reviews.
- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to rate products moderately, reflecting a balanced perspective on quality versus price, showing willingness to compromise on some aspects for overall satisfaction. 

Overall, the user demonstrates a clear inclination for comfortable, functional, and affordable gaming accessories while being critical of fit issues.
